item.title: 美国核心资本货物订单增长，超出所有预测
item.description: 美国 7 月份的商业设备订单增幅超过预期，表明随着贸易和税收政策的一些不确定性逐渐减弱，企业正在推进投资计划。【原文：US orders for business equipment increased in July by more than projected, suggesting companies are moving forward on investment plans as some of the trade and tax policy uncertainty gradually diminishes.】

item.title: 铃木汽车将在印度投资 80 亿美元，开始生产电动汽车
item.description: 铃木汽车公司首席执行官铃木敏弘（Toshihiro Suzuki）表示，该公司计划在印度投资超过 7000 亿卢比（约合 80 亿美元），这表明随着日本汽车制造商进军电动汽车生产领域，印度对该公司的重要性与日俱增。【原文：Suzuki Motor Corp. plans to invest over 700 billion rupees ($8 billion) in India, Chief Executive Officer Toshihiro Suzuki said, underscoring the country’s growing importance for the Japanese automaker as it forays into electric vehicles production.】

item.title: 巴西年度通胀因食品和汽油价格降低而降温
item.description: 由于食品和运输成本降低，巴西的年度通胀率在 8 月初有所放缓，在央行承诺维持高利率的情况下，这对消费者的宽慰有限。【原文：Brazil’s annual inflation slowed in early August on cheaper food and transportation costs, offering limited relief to consumers as the central bank pledges to keep interest rates high.】

item.title: 特朗普向风力发电场开战，撕毁规则手册
item.description:
美国政府反对在美国东海岸开展离岸项目的举措增加了投资者的风险。【原文：

The administration’s moves against offshore projects on the US East Coast heighten the risks for investors.

】

item.title: 雅苒股价上涨，与巴斯夫的美国蓝色氨项目被取消
item.description: 雅苒国际股份公司（Yara International ASA）和巴斯夫公司（BASF SE）放弃了在美国墨西哥湾沿岸开发低碳合成氨生产设施的项目，这使得这家在奥斯陆上市的化肥公司股价走高。【原文：Yara International ASA and BASF SE are abandoning a project to develop a low-carbon ammonia production facility on the US Gulf Coast, sending shares of the Oslo-listed fertilizer company higher.】

item.title: 匈牙利央行坚持谨慎政策，维持关键利率不变
item.description: 匈牙利央行的借贷成本保持在欧盟最高水平，决策者优先考虑货币稳定，而不是过早放松货币政策的潜在风险。【原文：Hungary’s central bank maintained the European Union’s highest borrowing costs, with policymakers prioritizing currency stability to the potential risk of premature monetary easing.】

item.title: Aris 与非正规矿工合作，引领哥伦比亚非法黄金热潮
item.description: 哥伦比亚的手工采矿者正在通过一些不同寻常的协议，帮助弗兰克-朱斯特拉支持的一家加拿大贵金属生产商在该国的非法黄金热潮中捞一把。【原文：Colombia’s artisanal miners are helping a Canadian precious metals producer backed by Frank Giustra navigate the country’s illicit gold boom via some unusual agreements.】

item.title: 中美计划举行会谈，玉米收于近一个月高位
item.description: 随着中国政府的一位高级谈判代表前往美国，玉米价格接近一个月高点，一旦贸易谈判取得成功，对美国农作物的需求将会增加。【原文：Corn held near a one-month high as a top Chinese government negotiator heads to the US, raising the specter of increased demand for American crops should the trade talks prove successful.】

item.title: 咖啡因担忧近期涨势导致价格膨胀而下跌
item.description: 在纽约，咖啡期货连续第二天下滑，缩减了八天上涨的部分涨幅，一些投资者认为这是过度上涨。【原文：Coffee futures slipped for a second day in New York, paring back part of an eight-day advance that some investors viewed as excessive.】

item.title: 据说 IT 公司 Aces 将在沙特推动数字化进程之际考虑出售股权
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，总部位于沙特阿拉伯的先进通信与电子系统公司（Advanced Communications and Electronics Systems Co.【原文：Saudi Arabia-based Advanced Communications and Electronics Systems Co. is weighing a stake sale, people familiar with the matter said, a deal that would give buyers exposure to the kingdom’s growing demand for digital infrastructure services.】

item.title: 中石油拟斥资 400 亿元收购储气库公司
item.description: 中国石油天然气股份有限公司（PetroChina Co.）【原文：PetroChina Co. has proposed buying three natural gas storage companies for 40 billion yuan ($5.6 billion).】

item.title: 斯里兰卡前总统因滥用资金被捕后获保释
item.description: 斯里兰卡前总统拉尼尔-维克拉马辛哈（Ranil Wickremesinghe）因被指控在2023年担任国家元首期间滥用政府资金而自8月22日起被关押，后获保释。【原文：Sri Lanka’s former President Ranil Wickremesinghe was released on bail after being held in custody since Aug. 22 on allegations he misused government funds while head of state in 2023.】

item.title: 德国国防科技的进步以及阻碍其发展的因素
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，克里斯蒂娜-基里亚索格洛（Christina Kyriasoglou）将回顾德国的最新发展，在德国，国防开支不再是禁忌。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Christina Kyriasoglou reviews recent developments in Germany, where spending on defense is no longer taboo.】

item.title: 香港豪宅今年创下 1.4 亿美元的拍卖纪录
item.description: 香港一栋新豪宅以 10.9 亿港元（1.4 亿美元）的价格售出，成为这个金融中心今年最昂贵的房屋成交价。【原文：A new mansion in Hong Kong sold for HK$1.09 billion ($140 million), the most expensive home sale in the financial hub this year.】

item.title: 据称法国巴黎银行将聘请华泰的蒋锡培领导中国股票出售交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，法国巴黎银行已聘请华泰证券股份有限公司的Doris Jiang领导该行在中国的股权资本市场交易。【原文：BNP Paribas SA has hired Huatai Securities Co.’s Doris Jiang to lead Chinese equity capital market deals for the French bank, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 苹果公司八月股价回升给担忧的投资者带来希望
item.description: 苹果公司的股价在经历了 2025 年大部分时间的挣扎后，正显示出生机勃勃的迹象，因为对该公司造成压力的关税相关风险开始缓解。【原文：Apple Inc.’s stock is showing signs of life after struggling through most of 2025, as the tariff-related risks that have weighed on the company start to ease.】

item.title: 特朗普解雇库克之举如何为美联储 "重大 "改革打开大门？
item.description: 我是马尔科姆-斯科特，驻悉尼的国际经济编辑。今天我们关注唐纳德-特朗普解雇美联储理事丽莎-库克的举动。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics editor in Sydney. Today we’re looking at Donald Trump’s move to fire Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易战下一季的三个关键问题
item.description: 美国传统夏季的结束还有几天，孩子们就要返校了。八月的夜晚热气腾腾，而秋天则可能是一个决定性的季节，以下是我的三件心事。【原文：The traditional end of the US summer is days away and the kids are returning to school. So here are three things I have on my mind as the steamy August tariff nights give way to what may end up being a defining autumn.】

item.title: 微软请求联邦调查局帮助追踪巴勒斯坦抗议活动
item.description:
上周，20 名敦促公司断绝与以色列军方关系的活动人士被捕。公司高管布拉德-史密斯（Brad Smith）说，他欢迎讨论，但不欢迎破坏。【原文：

Twenty activists urging company to sever ties with Israeli military were arrested last week. Executive Brad Smith said he welcomed discussion but not disruption.

】

item.title: AT&T 将以约 230 亿美元收购 EchoStar 频谱许可证
item.description: AT&T 公司将以约 230 亿美元的价格从 EchoStar 公司购买频谱许可证，这笔交易将扩大该电信公司在美国的网络。【原文：AT&T Inc. is to buy spectrum licenses from EchoStar Corp. for about $23 billion in a deal that will expand the telecommunications company’s US network.】

item.title: 爱沙尼亚指责俄罗斯干扰造成乌克兰无人机爆炸
item.description: 塔林的官员说，一架在爱沙尼亚坠毁的武装无人机很可能是乌克兰无人机，由于俄罗斯在波罗的海地区进行电子干扰而偏离了航线。【原文：An armed drone which crashed in Estonia is likely to be a Ukrainian drone that veered off-course due to Russia’s electronic interference in the Baltic region, officials in Tallinn said.】

item.title: 农夫山泉利润增长回升，负面宣传逐渐消失
item.description: 农夫山泉股份有限公司的上半年利润攀升至至少自 2019 年以来的最高水平，显示出这家中国瓶装水巨头的声誉在经历了一段时间的负面报道后出现了复苏迹象。【原文：Nongfu Spring Co.’s first-half profit climbed to the highest levels since at least 2019, showing signs of recovery following a period of negative publicity that weighed on the Chinese bottled water giant’s reputation.】

item.title: 众星拱月，美国短期收益率将进一步走低
item.description:
特朗普对美联储施压，经济增长放缓迹象指向两年期收益率下降。【原文：

Trump’s pressure on Fed, signs of slowing growth point to drop in 2-year yields.

】

item.title: 英国数据危机影响对政策至关重要的研究，学者发出警告
item.description: 英国经济学家机构警告说，英国官方指标危机的加深正在削弱对英国政策制定至关重要的学术研究，该机构呼吁采取 "紧急补救措施 "来解决这一问题。【原文：Academic research that is vital for UK policy making is being undermined by a deepening crisis in the country’s official indicators, the body for British economists warned, as it called for “urgent remedial action” to fix the problem.】

item.title: 什么是招致特朗普怒火的数字服务税？
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统改写全球贸易规则的努力中，针对大型科技公司收入的数字服务税再次成为热点。【原文：Digital services taxes targeting the revenue of big technology companies have returned as a flash point in President Donald Trump’s efforts to rewrite the rules of global trade.】

item.title: 经济放缓、市场波动损害回报，中国平安利润下滑
item.description: 平安保险（集团）股份有限公司上半年利润下降了 8.8%，原因是中国经济放缓期间股市波动和利率下调影响了投资回报。【原文：Ping An Insurance (Group) Co.‘s profit fell 8.8% in the first half as investment returns were dented by stock market volatility and lower interest rates during China’s economic slowdown.】

item.title: Sea 超越星展集团，成为东南亚最有价值公司
item.description: 新加坡的 Sea Ltd. 在其电子商务部门 Shopee 的推动下反弹 300%，超过星展集团控股有限公司，夺回了东南亚最有价值上市公司的头衔。【原文：Singapore’s Sea Ltd. has reclaimed its title as Southeast Asia’s most valuable publicly traded company, surpassing DBS Group Holdings Ltd. after a 300% comeback rally powered by its e-commerce arm Shopee.】

item.title: 法拉奇支持特朗普式驱逐议程，力争领导英国
item.description: 奈杰尔-法拉奇（Nigel Farage）誓言要将数万名寻求庇护者驱逐出英国，这与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在美国推行的政策如出一辙，因为他正努力引导其民粹主义改革党在下届大选中掌权。【原文：Nigel Farage vowed to expel tens of thousands of asylum-seekers from the UK, tapping a policy deployed in the US by President Donald Trump as he seeks to guide his populist Reform party to power at the next general election.】

item.title: 梅西最爱的饮料在米莱结束价格控制后大受欢迎
item.description:
几十年来，耶巴马黛茶种植者受益于国家干预。但现在，在自由主义总统的领导下，许多种植者正在为生存而挣扎。【原文：

For decades, yerba mate farmers benefited from state intervention. But now under a libertarian president many growers are struggling to survive.

】

item.title: 从保护主义到自由市场：阿根廷的耶巴马黛茶受到冲击
item.description:
几十年来，耶巴马黛茶生产商一直受益于国家干预。但现在，在自由主义总统的领导下，许多生产商正在为生存而挣扎。【原文：

Durante décadas, los productores de yerba mate se beneficiaron de la intervención estatal. Pero ahora, bajo un presidente libertario, muchos productores luchan por sobrevivir.

】
